name: Absence Request
storyline:
You were just having a dream, in your boarding school. Everything was normal.
Then you woke up. Which is also normal.
In your dream, you were falling. There was a big, circular shadow above you.
The dream made you want to find out more, so you got out of your school but everywhere you went, you were meant to be. You were expected there.
In fact, you were even late!
But that was because your dream was more than just a dream.

It was a memory.
summary:
A game where the objective is to solve the mystery of you and why you had that dream at the beginning of the game.
It has crafting, shooter and escaping capabilities and is mainly focused on pranking and humour.
